comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is a Brewster B-339B Buffalo (export version of the Brewster F2A Buffalo) initially destined for the Belgian Air Force (wearing US civil registration NX56B and Belgian Air Force markings during pre-delivery testing) only to be diverted to France and ultimately captured, tested, and scrapped by the Germans. See here: www.belgian-wings.be/Webpages/Navigator/Photos/MilltaryPi...
